1: I trust completely and live with steady, clear guidance.
2: Attentive goodness rescues and keeps people safe.
3: I continually seek the steadfast refuge that saves me
4: Compassionate justice rescues and protects people, securing safe lives.
5: I maintain steadfast hope and trust every day
6: I am supported from birth and continually give thanks.
7: I inspire many through my unwavering refuge.
8: I speak praise and honor throughout the day.
9: I have constant support throughout my old age.
10: Good counsel gathers together to protect and uplift life.
11: Help arrives; protection surrounds the vulnerable.
12: Help arrives swiftly, supportive presence remains close.
13: Protection and honor cover the soul, and peace and security prevail.
14: I stay hopeful and grow in gratitude every day.
15: I continually proclaim righteousness and boundless deliverance all day
16: I go forward in divine strength proclaiming true righteousness.
17: I keep learning and share wonderful works.
18: I show strength and power to this generation and future generations.
19: Highest righteousness achieves great deeds and inspires lasting wonder.
20: Restoring power revives and lifts from the deepest depths.
21: Grow in greatness and welcome comfort on every side.
22: I sing truth with music from a joyful heart
23: I sing with joy from a restored soul.
24: I speak of righteousness all day with joy.
